sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { RegisterService } from 'src/app/Services/register.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent { constructor(private service:RegisterService, private router: Router){} Add(name:any, email:any, phone:any, age:any){ if (name && email && phone && age) { // Check if all required fields have data let newStudent = {name , email , phone, age}; this.service.AddNewStudent(newStudent).subscribe(); // Navigate to home component after adding the new student this.router.navigate(['/']); } } }

Student registration form
